title: Clicking launch doesn't actually launch the client
body: When I click launch , it usually does nothing and I have to keep on launching and it only works when I have tried around 6 times. And to add to the problem when I get into the client, the shop shop just goes black and after a while it says it doesnt work so then I try to relog but hey!, the launch isnt doing anything.. rito plz

replies.body: Quite irritating when you want to play but the launcher plays up and wont launch.. FIX this %%%%. #BROKEN
This happens to me as well, i find if you just wait a bit then click launch its ok,but if you click launch straight away nothing happens.
